Value.description: Help translating for 'C::B' (sdk-2.23.0) projects Welcome to 'Collector' : plugin for help translate projects in 'CODE::BLOCKS' You can, by menu 'Collect' on menu bar 1- 'List from project' : list strings with selection keyword ('_') 2- 'Extract from project' : extract strings to 'name_project.po' with previous keyword 3- 'Stop current action' : abort current action

Value.thanksTo: CB IDE developers, plugins developers and others
